name: real-time-chat-monorepo
description: Real time chat monorepo application using WebSocket, Next JS, Nest JS, and Docker

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build: cd backend && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build
scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm run install:all && npm run build
